name: Catpack
description:
Play as Cat Bag, a nimble creature who constantly seeks adventure.
Loot chests, avoid spikes, kill or evade enemies and beat the game.Instructions appear in-game as you progress and unlock new items.

Credits:
Programming & Level Design  -  Ekincan
Animations & UI  -  Ryan Bolson
Tile & Background Art  -  Luis
Main Menu & Concept Art - Allon
Music & Sound  -  Befly
